languages.text: {n}Отряды блюстителей решительно разогнали толпы ударами шоковых дубинок и удушливым газом. Ворвавшись в часовни обреченных культов, они избили служек, сломали символы веры, что были сочтены неортодоксальными и удавили опасный призрак многоверия, угрожавший планете. Реликвии же, не оскорблявшие Императора, были реквизированы.{/n}

{n}The enforcers firmly dispersed the crowds with shock batons and choke gas. They burst into the chapels of the condemned cults, beat the acolytes, smashed any sacred symbols deemed unorthodox, and smothered the dangerous embers of spiritual disunion looming over the planet. The relics that were not an affront to the God-Emperor were confiscated.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Отряды блюстителей решительно разогнали толпы ударами шоковых дубинок и удушливым газом. Ворвавшись в часовни обреченных культов, они избили служек, сломали символы веры, что были сочтены неортодоксальными и удавили опасный призрак многоверия, угрожавший планете. Реликвии же, не оскорблявшие Императора, были реквизированы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The troops of the Enforcers have decisively dispersed the crowd with the jabs of the electrified batons and the tear gas. Rushing into the chapels of the condemned cults, they have beaten up the acolytes, broken down their sacred symbols that were deemed as unorthodox and crushed down the dangerous spirit of poly-belief threatening the planet.{/n}

{n}The troops of the Enforcers have decisively dispersed the crowd with the jabs of the electrified batons and the tear gas. Rushing into the chapels of the condemned cults, they have beaten up the acolytes, broken down their sacred symbols that were deemed as unorthodox and crushed down the dangerous spirit of poly-belief threatening the planet.{/n}

{n}The enforcers firmly dispersed the crowds with shock batons and choke gas. They burst into the chapels of the condemned cults, beat the acolytes, smashed any sacred symbols deemed unorthodox, and smothered the dangerous embers of spiritual disunion looming over the planet. The relics that were not an affront to the God-Emperor were confiscated.{/n}

They burst into the chapels of the condemned cults, beat the acolytes, smashed any sacred symbols deemed unorthodox, and smothered the dangerous embers of spiritual disunion looming over the planet. The relics that were not an affront to the God-Emperor were confiscated.{/n}

{n}The enforcers firmly dispersed the crowds with shock batons and choke gas. They burst into the chapels of the condemned cults, beat the acolytes, smashed any sacred symbols deemed unorthodox, and smothered the dangerous embers of spiritual disunion looming over the planet. The relics that were not an affront to the God-Emperor were confiscated.{/n}

languages.text: {n}执法者用警棍和毒气驱散了人群。他们冲进那些被定罪的教派教堂，殴打侍仆，砸碎一切不正统的神圣符号，扑灭了这颗行星所有可能会导致信仰分裂的危险灰烬。至于那些并没有冒犯神皇的遗物，则被通通没收。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers firmly dispersed the crowds with shock batons and choke gas. They burst into the chapels of the condemned cults, beat the acolytes, smashed any sacred symbols deemed unorthodox, and smothered the dangerous embers of spiritual disunion looming over the planet. The relics that were not an affront to the God-Emperor were confiscated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}执法者用警棍和毒气驱散了人群。他们冲进那些被定罪的教派教堂，殴打侍仆，砸碎一切不正统的神圣符号，扑灭了这颗行星所有可能会导致信仰分裂的危险灰烬。至于那些并没有冒犯神皇的遗物，则被通通没收。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El personal de seguridad dispersó a la multitud con porras de choque y gases asfixiantes. Irrumpieron en las capillas de los cultos condenados, golpearon a los acólitos, destrozaron los símbolos sagrados considerados poco ortodoxos y sofocaron los peligrosos focos de desunión espiritual que se cernían sobre el planeta. Las reliquias que no eran una afrenta al Dios Emperador fueron confiscadas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers firmly dispersed the crowds with shock batons and choke gas. They burst into the chapels of the condemned cults, beat the acolytes, smashed any sacred symbols deemed unorthodox, and smothered the dangerous embers of spiritual disunion looming over the planet. The relics that were not an affront to the God-Emperor were confiscated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El personal de seguridad dispersó a la multitud con porras de choque y gases asfixiantes. Irrumpieron en las capillas de los cultos condenados, golpearon a los acólitos, destrozaron los símbolos sagrados considerados poco ortodoxos y sofocaron los peligrosos focos de desunión espiritual que se cernían sobre el planeta. Las reliquias que no eran una afrenta al Dios Emperador fueron confiscadas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}エンフォーサーらはショックバトンとチョークガスで群衆を分散した。彼らは断罪された魔女団の礼拝堂に押し入り、アコライトたちを倒し、正統派ではないとみなされた神聖なシンボルを叩き壊し、惑星に迫り来る精神的不和の危険な残り火を鎮めた。神帝陛下への冒涜でない遺物は没収された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers firmly dispersed the crowds with shock batons and choke gas. They burst into the chapels of the condemned cults, beat the acolytes, smashed any sacred symbols deemed unorthodox, and smothered the dangerous embers of spiritual disunion looming over the planet. The relics that were not an affront to the God-Emperor were confiscated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エンフォーサーらはショックバトンとチョークガスで群衆を分散した。彼らは断罪された魔女団の礼拝堂に押し入り、アコライトたちを倒し、正統派ではないとみなされた神聖なシンボルを叩き壊し、惑星に迫り来る精神的不和の危険な残り火を鎮めた。神帝陛下への冒涜でない遺物は没収された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les prévôts dispersent la foule à coups de matraques électriques et de gaz lacrymogènes. Ils envahissent les chapelles des cultes condamnés, frappant les disciples, brisant les symboles sacrés jugés inappropriés et étouffant les braises de la scission spirituelle qui planait sur la planète. Les reliques qui ne constituaient aucun affront direct vis-à-vis de l'Empereur-Dieu sont confisquées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers firmly dispersed the crowds with shock batons and choke gas. They burst into the chapels of the condemned cults, beat the acolytes, smashed any sacred symbols deemed unorthodox, and smothered the dangerous embers of spiritual disunion looming over the planet. The relics that were not an affront to the God-Emperor were confiscated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les prévôts dispersent la foule à coups de matraques électriques et de gaz lacrymogènes. Ils envahissent les chapelles des cultes condamnés, frappant les disciples, brisant les symboles sacrés jugés inappropriés et étouffant les braises de la scission spirituelle qui planait sur la planète. Les reliques qui ne constituaient aucun affront direct vis-à-vis de l'Empereur-Dieu sont confisquées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Enforcers zerschlugen die Versammlungen mit Elektroschockern und Tränengas. Sie platzten in die Kapellen der verdammten Kulte, verprügelten die Akolythen, zerschlugen sämtliche heiligen Symbole, die als unorthodox angesehen wurde, und erstickten die gefährliche Glut der spirituellen Uneinigkeit, die den Planeten bedroht hatte. Die Relikte, die keine Beleidigung des Gottimperators darstellten, wurden beschlagnahmt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers firmly dispersed the crowds with shock batons and choke gas. They burst into the chapels of the condemned cults, beat the acolytes, smashed any sacred symbols deemed unorthodox, and smothered the dangerous embers of spiritual disunion looming over the planet. The relics that were not an affront to the God-Emperor were confiscated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Enforcers zerschlugen die Versammlungen mit Elektroschockern und Tränengas. Sie platzten in die Kapellen der verdammten Kulte, verprügelten die Akolythen, zerschlugen sämtliche heiligen Symbole, die als unorthodox angesehen wurde, und erstickten die gefährliche Glut der spirituellen Uneinigkeit, die den Planeten bedroht hatte. Die Relikte, die keine Beleidigung des Gottimperators darstellten, wurden beschlagnahmt.{/n}
